name: Vegetable Slicer
description:
This is the best fruit slicer and vegetable slicer game in the world. Perfect veggie slices is a very entertaining and addicting game.

Tap and Hold on your mobile screen to slice vegetables & fruits perfectly and get more coins. Listen the knife sound when you are playing. Slice various vegetable and fruits like orange, capsicum, tomato, banana and etc. Male a delicious vegetable and fruit mixed salad.

Features:

-This Slice game is totally free to download.

-Perfect Veggie Slices with amazing style & animations

-Easily slice veggies perfectly with knives

-Play like a real kitchen chopper
